summary: Consume Box API to perform operations like copying, deleting, downloading, and sharing files.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to perform operations on (File, Folder, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: file id
parameters.description: The ID of the file to perform the operation on.

parameters.name: parent id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder to copy the file to.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include when performing the copy operation.

parameters.name: binary property name
parameters.description: The name of the output binary field to store the downloaded file.
